title: Several items looted from Negombo hotels returned to police
body_lines: A group of individuals have returned several items that were looted from hotels in Negombo and other areas following the recent unrest, to the Katana police station.
Videos were circulated on social media showing that many individuals were carrying several items from the hotels and houses in Negombo and several other areas which had been set on fire.
Police said mattresses, freezers, chairs, various electronics were among those items returned.
Earlier, police said they would take action against those involved in violent incidents and those who looted properties and items from the hotels and houses which were destroyed by mobs.
